Actions.Name: Add Idea Vote
Actions.Description: Add your vote to an idea to show your support.

Actions.Name: Get Course
Actions.Description: Get the details of a course including module and unit information.

Actions.Name: Get Instructor
Actions.Description: Get detailed information for a specific instructor including their course list.

Actions.Name: List Courses
Actions.Description: List the published training courses we have available.

Actions.Name: List Ideas
Actions.Description: This will list active ideas that have been submitted by our community.

Actions.Name: List Instructors
Actions.Description: List summary information about our instructors.

Actions.Name: List My Courses
Actions.Description: List the courses you have enrolled in and your progress.

Actions.Name: When a new course is published
Actions.Description: Get notified when a new course is published on  our learning platform.

Actions.Name: When a course notification is received
Actions.Description: Get notification when a course you are enrolled in has a new notification published.

Actions.Name: When a new idea is created
Actions.Description: Get notified when a new idea is added by the community.

Actions.Name: Search
Actions.Description: Search our course catalog and related community content.
